subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms}}

Sino-Tibetan. Cognate with {{och-l|扞|to shield; to protect}}, {{och-l|閈|gate}}. Compare {{cog|bo|འགལ||to go against, to violate, to contradict}}, {{cog|my|ကာ||shield; to shield; to block}}.
